description: Gets information about the specified route analysis.

parameters.name: GlobalNetworkId
parameters.description: The ID of the global network.

parameters.name: RouteAnalysisId
parameters.description: The ID of the route analysis.

nested_items.name: RouteAnalysis
nested_items.description: The route analysis.

nested_items.name: GlobalNetworkId
nested_items.description: The ID of the global network.

nested_items.name: OwnerAccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the AWS account that created the route analysis.

nested_items.name: RouteAnalysisId
nested_items.description: The ID of the route analysis.

nested_items.name: StartTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time that the analysis started.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the route analysis.

nested_items.name: TransitGatewayAttachmentArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the transit gateway attachment.

nested_items.name: TransitGatewayArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the transit gateway.

nested_items.name: IpAddress
nested_items.description: The IP address.

nested_items.name: Destination
nested_items.description: The destination.

nested_items.name: TransitGatewayAttachmentArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the transit gateway attachment.

nested_items.name: TransitGatewayArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the transit gateway.

nested_items.name: IpAddress
nested_items.description: The IP address.

nested_items.name: IncludeReturnPath
nested_items.description: Indicates whether to analyze the return path. The return path is not analyzed if the forward path analysis does not succeed.

nested_items.name: UseMiddleboxes
nested_items.description: Indicates whether to include the location of middlebox appliances in the route analysis.

nested_items.name: ForwardPath
nested_items.description: The forward path.

nested_items.name: CompletionStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the analysis at completion.

nested_items.name: ResultCode
nested_items.description: The result of the analysis. If the status is NOT_CONNECTED, check the reason code.

nested_items.name: ReasonCode
nested_items.description: The reason code. Available only if a connection is not found.
BLACKHOLE_ROUTE_FOR_DESTINATION_FOUND - Found a black hole route with the destination CIDR block.
CYCLIC_PATH_DETECTED - Found the same resource multiple times while traversing the path.
INACTIVE_ROUTE_FOR_DESTINATION_FOUND - Found an inactive route with the destination CIDR block.
MAX_HOPS_EXCEEDED - Analysis exceeded 64 hops without finding the destination.
ROUTE_NOT_FOUND - Cannot find a route table with the destination CIDR block.
TGW_ATTACH_ARN_NO_MATCH - Found an attachment, but not with the correct destination ARN.
TGW_ATTACH_NOT_FOUND - Cannot find an attachment.
TGW_ATTACH_NOT_IN_TGW - Found an attachment, but not to the correct transit gateway.
TGW_ATTACH_STABLE_ROUTE_TABLE_NOT_FOUND - The state of the route table association is not associated.

nested_items.name: ReasonContext
nested_items.description: Additional information about the path. Available only if a connection is not found.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Path
nested_items.description: The route analysis path.

nested_items.name: Sequence
nested_items.description: The sequence number in the path. The destination is 0.

nested_items.name: RegisteredGatewayArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the gateway.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the resource.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The resource type.

nested_items.name: Definition
nested_items.description: Information about the resource, in JSON format. Network Manager gets this information by describing the resource using its Describe API call.

nested_items.name: NameTag
nested_items.description: The value for the Name tag.

nested_items.name: IsMiddlebox
nested_items.description: Indicates whether this is a middlebox appliance.

nested_items.name: DestinationCidrBlock
nested_items.description: The destination CIDR block in the route table.

nested_items.name: ReturnPath
nested_items.description: The return path.

nested_items.name: CompletionStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the analysis at completion.

nested_items.name: ResultCode
nested_items.description: The result of the analysis. If the status is NOT_CONNECTED, check the reason code.

nested_items.name: ReasonCode
nested_items.description: The reason code. Available only if a connection is not found.
BLACKHOLE_ROUTE_FOR_DESTINATION_FOUND - Found a black hole route with the destination CIDR block.
CYCLIC_PATH_DETECTED - Found the same resource multiple times while traversing the path.
INACTIVE_ROUTE_FOR_DESTINATION_FOUND - Found an inactive route with the destination CIDR block.
MAX_HOPS_EXCEEDED - Analysis exceeded 64 hops without finding the destination.
ROUTE_NOT_FOUND - Cannot find a route table with the destination CIDR block.
TGW_ATTACH_ARN_NO_MATCH - Found an attachment, but not with the correct destination ARN.
TGW_ATTACH_NOT_FOUND - Cannot find an attachment.
TGW_ATTACH_NOT_IN_TGW - Found an attachment, but not to the correct transit gateway.
TGW_ATTACH_STABLE_ROUTE_TABLE_NOT_FOUND - The state of the route table association is not associated.

nested_items.name: ReasonContext
nested_items.description: Additional information about the path. Available only if a connection is not found.
(string) ---
